divs: sighting detailsit was dusky dark. i had stepped outside for a smoke when i just glanced up at the sky like i usually do just to take in the view of the stars when i saw an object that was flying directly over the house. it had 4 bright lights at the bottom of it which gave me a visual of the outline of this object. it was moving in an easterly to westerly direction and was not making a sound which was peculiar..looking at this object which was probably about 2000-3000 ft.high i could tell it was not like anything i've ever seen fly over the house. if you was to take a half-a-dozen battleship carriers and put them side by side and twice that many in length then you would get a pretty good idea of the size and width of this thing..i did not have my camera on me at the time and was afraid to go inside the house and get it for fear that it would be gone by the time i got back outdoors. the night was crystal clear, not a cloud in the sky. it took prbably less than a minute and a half to disappear from sight..alls i could do was shake my head and wonder if i was seeing things. i told my wife about it and described it to her and she said that she had seen something of a familiar shape back in the early 60's hovering over a graveyard that was behind their house. i posted what i saw on facebook and asked if anyone else in rome had seen it..naturally the answer was no, and the people asked me was i sure i was smoking a cigg. and not something else.hahaha..i know what i saw that evening. i live in a wooded area on the outskirts of rome in the woods. the direction it was going would have taken it almost over the city of rome..if anyone has seen something similar they can contact me at *(wit's email address removed--cms\sg) and let me know that i'm not hallucinating.would love to see it again..
